description: This file defines a class 'CSVUrlKnowledgeBase' that manages loading and processing CSV data from URLs, including synchronous and asynchronous methods, with support for metadata and URL validation.

classes.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages loading CSV data from URLs, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations, with metadata handling and URL validation.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Property that yields lists of Document objects from the URLs, handling both URL strings and dictionaries with metadata.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator that yields lists of Document objects from the URLs.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads documents from a specified URL into the vector database, with optional metadata and control flags.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads documents from a specified URL into the vector database, with optional metadata and control flags.

methods.name: _is_valid_csv_url
methods.description: Helper method to check if a URL ends with '.csv', indicating a valid CSV URL.
